articles.author: Felix Keith
articles.title: Man Utd transfer round-up: Three-man shortlist to replace Maguire as Amrabat decision made - The Mirror
articles.description: Manchester United are considering their options to replace West Ham-bound Harry Maguire, while other departures can make room for Fiorentina midfielder Sofyan Amrabat
articles.content:
Manchester United are fast approaching the start of their Premier League campaign against crisis-hit Wolves on Monday night. 
 United have completed their busy pre-season period, but with the summer… [+2944 chars]
